draw_explain: 该prompt通过展示带有工具和蓝图的工作台，直观表现'setup'的装备、安装和计划三重含义。工具箱体现'装备'，组装中的书架体现'安装'，展开的蓝图对应'计划'，所有元素在统一场景中形成视觉关联。金属工具与纸张的材质对比增强记忆点，动态的组装动作暗示正在进行安装过程。
draw_prompt: A well-lit workshop table with an open toolbox containing screwdrivers and wrenches, next to blueprints of a bookshelf. In the background, hands assembling wooden shelves with visible screw joints, ruler and measuring tape on crumpled paper, sharp shadows emphasizing industrial aesthetics.
